title: [Large-Scale] Organizational Learning Theory and Critical Realism Application Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of organizational behavior and learning theories
context.additional_context: A course focusing on critical application of organizational learning theories by professionals in real work environments.

learning_goals: Reinterpreting organizational learning theory from a critical realism perspective and applying it to practical cases
Analyzing contextual characteristics of organizational learning to propose change management strategies
Developing practical strategies based on the interconnectedness of learning organization theory and organizational learning theory

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
